expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to 'review' mode based on the keyword in arguments
Agent shows pending learnings that have been captured but not yet promoted
Agent displays the frequency count for each pending learning (how many times the correction has been observed)
Agent identifies which learnings have reached the promotion threshold (3+ occurrences across 2+ sessions)
Agent suggests next steps: promote high-frequency learnings or audit for stale/contradictory entries
